name: gov-checkbox-group
label: 复选组
codeSnap:
<checkbox-group
    option-key="name"
    options="{{[{name: '两字', value: 1}, {name: '五个字左右', value: 2}}}"
    value="{{[1]}}"
>
</checkbox-group>

demoCode.s:
<view class="wrap">
    <view class="line">复选组 checkbox-group</view>
    <view class="line">行内多项 [inline=true]</view>
    <view>配置两行</view>
    <gov-checkbox-group
        class="checkbox-group"
        option-key="name"
        column="{{2}}"
        options="{{group1}}"
        value="{{checkedList}}"
    >
    </gov-checkbox-group>
</view>

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: 当前 options 选中状态值

attributes.name: activeColor
attributes.description: 复选项选中时的文字和icon颜色

attributes.name: activeInlineBgColor
attributes.description: 在inline 模式下选中时的背景颜色

events.name: click
events.description: 选中事件，返回当前复选框点击状态

events.name: change
events.description: 改变事件，返回当前复选组状态
